query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS quality_statistics_reports (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  period_type ENUM('daily', 'weekly', 'monthly', 'quarterly', 'yearly') DEFAULT 'daily' NOT NULL,
  production_line_id INT,
  workstation_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  total_samples INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  ok_count INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  ng_count INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  warning_count INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  ok_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  ng_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  avg_quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  min_quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  max_quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  std_dev_quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  avg_cpk DECIMAL(5,3),
  min_cpk DECIMAL(5,3),
  max_cpk DECIMAL(5,3),
  total_defects INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  defects_by_type JSON,
  top_defect_types JSON,
  trend_data JSON,
  prev_period_ok_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  ok_rate_change DECIMAL(5,2),
  trend_direction ENUM('improving', 'stable', 'declining') DEFAULT 'stable',
  generated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  generated_by INT,
  INDEX idx_quality_stats_date (report_date),
  INDEX idx_quality_stats_period (period_type),
  INDEX idx_quality_stats_line (production_line_id),
  INDEX idx_quality_stats_product (product_id)
);

  ok_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  ng_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  avg_quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  min_quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  max_quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  std_dev_quality_score DECIMAL(5,2),
  avg_cpk DECIMAL(5,3),
  min_cpk DECIMAL(5,3),
  max_cpk DECIMAL(5,3),
  total_defects INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  defects_by_type JSON,
  top_defect_types JSON,
  trend_data JSON,
  prev_period_ok_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  ok_rate_change DECIMAL(5,2),
  trend_direction ENUM('improving', 'stable', 'declining') DEFAULT 'stable',
  generated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  generated_by INT,
  INDEX idx_quality_stats_date (report_date),
